price: He said, “Disguise her throne for her, so we may see whether she can discover the truth, or she will be of those who cannot recognize.”
arabic: قَالَ نَكِّرُواْ لَهَا عَرۡشَهَا نَنظُرۡ أَتَهۡتَدِيٓ أَمۡ تَكُونُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
